amendatorysection.para: No officer shall receive any pay or perquisite from the city other than his or her salary; and the city council shall not pay or appropriate any money or other valuable thing to any person, not an officer, for the performance of any act, service, or duty, the performance of which shall come within the proper scope of the duties of any officer of the city, unless the same is specially appropriated and ordered by unanimous vote of all members elected to the council.
